column5: Yeah, been looking there?
I fish for anything that swims (mostly Smallies). Just that the Perch are in 15 mins from home.    They were tasty
That is a beautiful boat! I own a smokercraft so maybe we're cousins? (lol)
sweet ride man. I hope you have many years of enjoyment out of it. Brufan
nice boat
nice color choice!
Thanks guys. Tell you ... it's way more comfy fishing out of this then my canoe.

I finally picked up the new boat Sat.      Waited about a month for a couple things, but it was worth the wait. Boy was I wired for the drive up Sat morning.  Took it it out on Lake Simcoe for a test run. Fun having a boat with a bit of get-up-and-go. Lot more boat then my past ones. Hope to get it out this week for some Perch and see how it fishes.
Looks nice. Good luck with the perch.
Congrats... Very nice looking boat...  Tiz
VERY nice! Like that high ski rope hook up. Remember nobody stands when pulling someone.. being up there if the rope recoils it will go over everyone's head!

I always enjoy  the posts when someone buys a new boat !!  Congrats on the new ride, that's a real beaut and should serve you well for a long time. My bro-in-law has had a Sylvan for many years and has always been very happy with it.
Nice looking rig.  I remember the day I picked up my new boat.  It made the top ten of the best days of my life.
Nice ride.
Beauty Vessel. Congrats!!
Nice rig! You'll be greatful you opted for the extra h.p, to many boats are purchased under power, now get out there and get fishing!!!!
It's also so that I can fold up the rear bench while pulling a skier.
Yeah, there a several things that are "family" oriented on this boat. But I hope to get riggers on it next year.
Sweet. I got a new Sylvan last year...they are nice boats
I was pretty pumped. Even the guys at the marina commented on how excited I was.  I was a big kid ... what can I say.
I definitely wanted to avoid being underpowered. Then they came out with the 125 Optimax based on the same block just after I ordered it.  Planning to do a little Perch fishing tomorrow.
LOL it is funny seeing the reaction when they first receive there brand new boat.  Kinda makes me jealous and feel like a kid in a Candy store kinda look.  Congrats
Very nice!!! Congrats and many many years of safe boating.
Yeah, I'm pretty sure I was wearing that goofy grin all day.
Nice ride...thanks for the boat porn.
Nice boat. Sandy Cove?
Nice rig for sure cool colour, I like my Opti.
Nice looking machine you got there. Looks like it has all the toys you could ask for on it.  Enjoy!
That's a whole lotta boat for Perch'n  Congrats on the new boat, she's a beaut!
Very nice! I like the colour, nice looking trailer too!
